weather_report:
A gentle sun bathes Downtown San Francisco in a soothing golden light this morning, as the crisp air feels invigorating against the skin. With temperatures hovering around a delightful mid-fifties and a mild breeze whispering through the streets, it’s an ideal time for those seeking solace outdoors. The sky presents a serene blue canvas, devoid of fog or the usual marine layer, allowing for stunning views of the city and the iconic Golden Gate Bridge standing proudly against the distant hills.

As the day unfolds, temperatures are expected to gradually slip into the lower fifty’s, so layering is advisable—perhaps a light sweater over a shirt. The evening promises to remain mostly clear, dropping to the low forties, inviting the prospect of a cozy night in your favorite café, or a leisurely stroll through the quiet streets, where the shimmer of city lights reflects off the bay. As time meanders on a Friday, an afternoon walk along the Embarcadero could be a pleasant retreat, making way for a peaceful end to the week amidst the calming waters of the bay.
